Flub.Name: Blend
Flub.Description: Blends the values of the two inputs.

Flub.Name: Add
Flub.Description: Adds Input2 to Input1.

Flub.Name: Screen
Flub.Description: Adds Input2 to Input1 without overexposing the output.

Flub.Name: Subtract
Flub.Description: Subtracts Input2 from Input1.

Flub.Name: Multiply
Flub.Description: Multiplies Input1 by Input2.

Flub.Name: Divide
Flub.Description: Divides Input1 by Input2.

Flub.Name: Max
Flub.Description: Selects the higher of the two inputs.

Flub.Name: Min
Flub.Description: Selects the lower of the two inputs.

Flub.Name: SqRt
Flub.Description: The square root of the two combined terrains.

Flub.Name: Power
Flub.Description: Uses Input2 to create exponents of Input1.

Flub.Name: Difference
Flub.Description: Creates the difference of the two inputs.

Flub.Name: Uniform
Flub.Description: Treat all inputs equally.

Flub.Name: Ratio
Flub.Description: The ratio to be applied for all inputs if Uniform option is checked.

Flub.Name: Ratio 1
Flub.Description: The ratio between input port and layer1 port

Flub.Name: Ratio 2
Flub.Description: The ratio between input port and layer2 port

Flub.Name: Ratio 3
Flub.Description: The ratio between input port and layer3 port

Flub.Name: Ratio 4
Flub.Description: The ratio between input port and layer4 port

Flub.Name: Ratio 5
Flub.Description: The ratio between input port and layer5 port

Flub.Name: Ratio 6
Flub.Description: The ratio between input port and layer6 port

Flub.Name: Ratio 7
Flub.Description: The ratio between input port and layer7 port

Flub.Name: Ratio 8
Flub.Description: The ratio between input port and layer8 port

Flub.Name: Ratio 9
Flub.Description: The ratio between input port and layer9 port
